mapper.select: select rst.*, l.NAME namep from (select ospc.*, ori.NAME ori from (select osp.*, c.* from (select os.*, p.PRO_NAME pname, p.PRO_QTY, p.cate, p.seller_id, p.price price_origin, p.pro_date, p.origin, p.sell_on from (select s.*, t.RATE from (select o.*, s.state st from (select * from ORDERTBL where order_num = #{num}) o left join STATE s on o.state = s.STATE_NUM) s left join CUPON_TYPE t on s.cupon_type = t.CUPON_NUM) os left join PRODUCTTBL p on os.pro_num = p.PRO_NUM) osp left join SMALL_CATEGORY c on osp.cate = c.S_CATE) ospc left join ORIGINTBL ori on ospc.origin = ori.NUM)rst left join LARGE_CATEGORY l on rst.parent = l.B_CATE
select * from (select * from COUNSEL where user_id = #{id}) c left join COUNSEL_CATEGORY t on c.cate = t.NUM order by c.counsel_date desc
select * from USER_LOGIN_LOG where id={id} order by CHECKIN_DATE desc
mapper.update: update ordertbl set state = #{state} where order_num = #{num}

update user_record set buy_total = buy_total + (select price from ORDERTBL where ORDER_NUM = #{num}), point = point + (select price * (select rate from point) / 100 from ORDERTBL where ORDER_NUM = #{num}) where id = (select user_id from ORDERTBL where ORDER_NUM = #{num})

update seller_record set price_total = price_total+(select price from ORDERTBL where ORDER_NUM = #{num}) where id = (select seller_id from PRODUCTTBL where PRO_NUM = (select pro_num from ORDERTBL where ORDER_NUM = #{num}))
update sell_qty set TOTAL_SELL = TOTAL_SELL+(select order_qty from ORDERTBL where order_num = #{num}) where pro_num = (select pro_num from ORDERTBL where order_num = #{num})
update PRODUCTTBL set PRO_QTY = pro_qty + (select order_qty from ORDERTBL where order_num = #{num}) where PRO_NUM = (select pro_num from ORDERTBL where order_num = #{num})
